cast.name: 拉塞尔·霍华德 Russell Howard

trans_title: 拉塞尔·霍华德的好新闻 第九季
introduction: The ninth series of Russell Howard's Good News moves to BBC Two. Russell once again offers his unique and quirky take on the week's global headlines and bizarre news stories. Sifting through over 60 international news channels, 140 newspapers from around the world and over 1,000 news clips, no stone is left unturned in his pursuit of the weird and wonderful stories that have been dominating the press this week. Russell is also joined by a special guest with an amazing story to tell.
chinese_title: 拉塞尔·霍华德的好新闻 第九季
